itv_asset_tree.core.interfaces module¶

class itv_asset_tree.core.interfaces.ITreeInsert[source]¶

Bases: ABC

Interface for inserting items into an asset tree.

This interface defines the required method for inserting an item under a specified parent path.

abstractmethod insert_item(parent_path: str, item_definition: dict)[source]¶

Inserts an item into the tree under the specified parent path.

Parameters:

  • parent_path (str) – The path of the parent node where the item should be inserted.

  • item_definition (dict) – A dictionary defining the item’s attributes.

class itv_asset_tree.core.interfaces.ITreeMove[source]¶

Bases: ABC

Interface for moving items within an asset tree.

This interface enforces the implementation of item movement between tree locations.

abstractmethod move_item(source: str, destination: str)[source]¶

Moves an item from the source path to the destination path.

Parameters:

  • source (str) – The current location of the item in the tree.

  • destination (str) – The new location where the item should be moved.

class itv_asset_tree.core.interfaces.ITreeRemove[source]¶

Bases: ABC

Interface for removing items from an asset tree.

This interface enforces the implementation of item deletion within a tree structure.

abstractmethod remove_item(item_path: str)[source]¶

Removes an item from the tree at the specified path.

Parameters:

item_path (str) – The path of the item to be removed.

itv_asset_tree.core.push_manager module¶

class itv_asset_tree.core.push_manager.PushManager(tree, strategy: PushStrategy = None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Handles pushing an asset tree to Seeq using different push strategies.

This class manages the process of pushing a tree using a specified strategy, allowing for flexibility in how the push operation is executed.

push(metadata_state_file=None)[source]¶

Executes the push operation using the assigned push strategy.

Parameters:

metadata_state_file (str, optional) – Path to a metadata state file for storing push state.

Returns:

The result of the push operation, as determined by the strategy.

Return type:

Any

itv_asset_tree.core.push_strategies module¶

class itv_asset_tree.core.push_strategies.BatchPush[source]¶

Bases: PushStrategy

Batches multiple tree changes before committing them to Seeq.

clear_batch()[source]¶

Clears the batch queue, discarding all pending changes.

commit()[source]¶

Pushes all batched asset trees to Seeq at once.

push(tree, metadata_state_file=None)[source]¶

Adds an asset tree to the batch queue.

Parameters:

  • tree – The asset tree to be added to the batch.

  • metadata_state_file (str, optional) – The path to the metadata state file.

Raises:

ValueError – If the tree is not available.

class itv_asset_tree.core.push_strategies.DryRunPush[source]¶

Bases: PushStrategy

Simulates a push operation without actually modifying Seeq.

push(tree, metadata_state_file=None)[source]¶

Performs a dry-run push for testing purposes.

Parameters:

  • tree – The asset tree being simulated.

  • metadata_state_file (str, optional) – The path to the metadata state file.

Returns:

Details of the simulated push operation.

Return type:

dict

class itv_asset_tree.core.push_strategies.ImmediatePush[source]¶

Bases: PushStrategy

Pushes changes to Seeq immediately after every modification.

push(tree, metadata_state_file=None)[source]¶

Executes an immediate push operation for the given asset tree.

Parameters:

  • tree – The asset tree to be pushed.

  • metadata_state_file (str, optional) – The path to the metadata state file.

Returns:

A message indicating the success or failure of the push operation.

Return type:

dict

Raises:

ValueError – If the tree is not available for pushing.

class itv_asset_tree.core.push_strategies.PushStrategy[source]¶

Bases: ABC

Abstract base class defining the interface for different push strategies.

Subclasses must implement the push method to define how asset trees should be pushed to Seeq.

abstractmethod push(tree, metadata_state_file=None)[source]¶

Pushes the asset tree to Seeq.

Parameters:

  • tree – The asset tree to be pushed.

  • metadata_state_file (str, optional) – The path to the metadata state file.

itv_asset_tree.core.tree_manager module¶

class itv_asset_tree.core.tree_manager.TreeManager(workbook: str)[source]¶

Bases: ABC

Abstract base class for managing asset trees in Seeq.

This class defines a blueprint for constructing and clearing asset trees within a specified workbook.

abstractmethod build_tree(friendly_name: str, description: str)[source]¶

Constructs a new tree with the specified name and description.

Parameters:

  • friendly_name (str) – The display name of the tree.

  • description (str) – A description of the tree.

abstractmethod clear_existing_tree(tree_name: str)[source]¶

Clears an existing tree by its name, removing it from the workbook.

Parameters:

tree_name (str) – The name of the tree to be cleared.
